snippet.title: Otometeki Koi Kakumei * Love Revo! Portable promotional video
snippet.description:
http://otakuxgamer.com/?p=6519

PlayAsia's description:

This is a story about diet and romance. The Heroine (name changeable) used to be a teenage model pretty, however, due to her inability to restrain her gluttonous instinct, she is currently a 100 kg lump of fat. Don't worry, though, with the handsome boys living in her father's apartment complex and her equally overweight best friend will spur her on the course to lose weight.

Design your schedule, exercise, visit the sports shop or socialize with the guys, join in mini games and initiate special events, these all help you to gain confidence, lose weight and eventually, get the guy.
